languages.text: Перед вами разверзается огромный портал, из которого выплывает ужасающего вида транспорт. Его корпус испещрен нечестивыми знаками Последнего восхода, а за ним на цепях тянутся обледеневшие в пустоте трупы. Астропатический хор в миг его появления заходится в агонии. За гигантом, словно алчущие добычи псы, следуют меньшие корабли богохульников. Экипаж проклинает врагов Человечества и рвется изничтожить еретиков.

A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.
languages.original_text: Перед вами разверзается огромный портал, из которого выплывает ужасающего вида транспорт. Его корпус испещрен нечестивыми знаками Последнего восхода, а за ним на цепях тянутся обледеневшие в пустоте трупы. Астропатический хор в миг его появления заходится в агонии. languages.text: Vor dir öffnet sich ein riesiges Portal, durch das ein grauenhaftes Transportschiff fliegt. Sein Rumpf ist mit den unheiligen Symbolen der Letzten Dämmerung übersät und das Schiff selbst zieht in der Leere zu Eis erstarrte Leichen an Ketten hinter sich her. Der astropathische Chor bricht in Wehklagen aus. Dem Koloss folgen kleinere Schiffe der Blasphemiker wie Hunde auf der Suche nach Beute. Die Crew verflucht die Feinde der Menschheit und ist bereit, die Ketzer zu vernichten.
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.

languages.text: Un immense portail se déploie devant vous, dont émerge un effroyable transporteur. Sa coque est criblée des marques impies de l'Aube finale, et il remorque dans son sillage un cortège de cadavres enchaînés, gelés par le froid glacial qui règne dans le vide. Le chœur astropathique se met à gémir de douleur. Le mastodonte est suivi d'un cortège de vaisseaux de plus petite taille, pareils à une meute de chiens de chasse en quête de leur future proie. Maudissant les ennemis de l'humanité, l'équipage se tient prêt à anéantir les hérétiques.
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.

Le chœur astropathique se met à gémir de douleur. Le mastodonte est suivi d'un cortège de vaisseaux de plus petite taille, pareils à une meute de chiens de chasse en quête de leur future proie. Maudissant les ennemis de l'humanité, l'équipage se tient prêt à anéantir les hérétiques.

languages.text: Un enorme portal se abre ante ti, dejando pasar un transporte espantoso. Su casco está cubierto de las blasfemas marcas del Amanecer Final, y arrastra detrás de sí cadáveres sujetos por cadenas, congelados por el frío del vacío. El Coro de Astrópatas empieza a gemir, agónico. Al coloso le siguen otras naves herejes más pequeñas, como perros de caza que ansían nuevas presas. La tripulación maldice a los enemigos de la Humanidad y se prepara para destruir a los herejes.
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Un enorme portal se abre ante ti, dejando pasar un transporte espantoso. Su casco está cubierto de las blasfemas marcas del Amanecer Final, y arrastra detrás de sí cadáveres sujetos por cadenas, congelados por el frío del vacío. El Coro de Astrópatas empieza a gemir, agónico. Al coloso le siguen otras naves herejes más pequeñas, como perros de caza que ansían nuevas presas. La tripulación maldice a los enemigos de la Humanidad y se prepara para destruir a los herejes.

languages.text: 目の前に巨大なポータルが広がり、恐ろしい輸送船が現れる。その船体には「最後の夜明け」の不浄の印が刻まれ、背後には鎖につながれ、凍える虚空で凍り付いた死体が伸びている。感応通信聖歌隊が苦しみの叫びをあげ始める。その巨体の後を、獲物に飢えた犬のように、冒涜者たちの小型船が追ってくる。クルーたちは人類の敵を呪い、異端者たちを滅ぼす準備を整える。
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.

traits.locale_text: 目の前に巨大なポータルが広がり、恐ろしい輸送船が現れる。その船体には「最後の夜明け」の不浄の印が刻まれ、背後には鎖につながれ、凍える虚空で凍り付いた死体が伸びている。感応通信聖歌隊が苦しみの叫びをあげ始める。その巨体の後を、獲物に飢えた犬のように、冒涜者たちの小型船が追ってくる。クルーたちは人類の敵を呪い、異端者たちを滅ぼす準備を整える。

languages.text: 你面前出现了一扇巨大的传送门，传送门里飞出了一艘恐怖的运输船。它的舰体上布满了“终末黎明”教派的邪恶印迹，后面拖着无数被铁链锁住的尸体，尸体在虚空中结成了冰。这艘船出现的瞬间，你的星语唱诗班就痛苦地哀号起来。这艘大船后面跟着许多亵渎者的小型战舰，仿佛饥渴难耐的猎犬一样。所有船员都在齐声咒骂着人类之敌，准备消灭那些异端分子。
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.

traits.locale_text: 你面前出现了一扇巨大的传送门，传送门里飞出了一艘恐怖的运输船。它的舰体上布满了“终末黎明”教派的邪恶印迹，后面拖着无数被铁链锁住的尸体，尸体在虚空中结成了冰。这艘船出现的瞬间，你的星语唱诗班就痛苦地哀号起来。这艘大船后面跟着许多亵渎者的小型战舰，仿佛饥渴难耐的猎犬一样。所有船员都在齐声咒骂着人类之敌，准备消灭那些异端分子。

languages.text: Gözlerinin önünde devasa bir geçit beliriyor ve içinden dehşet verici bir nakliye gemisi çıkıyor. Geminin gövdesi, Nihai Şafak'ın uğursuz işaretleriyle dolu. Ardındaysa zincirlerle sürüklenen uçsuzun soğukluğunda donmuş cesetler uzanıyor. Astropatik Koro, ızdırap içinde ağıt yakmaya başlıyor. Dev geminin izinden avlanmak için ağzının suyu akan köpekleri andırırcasına günahkârların daha küçük gemileri geliyor. Mürettebat, İnsanlığın düşmanlarına lanetler yağdırarak kâfirleri yok etmeye hazırlanıyor.
languages.original_text: A huge portal unfolds before you, and a horrifying transport vessel emerges. Its hull is riddled with the unholy markings of the Final Dawn, and behind it stretch corpses on chains, frozen in the icy void. The Astropathic Choir starts wailing in agony. The giant is followed by the blasphemers' smaller ships, like eager dogs hungry for prey. The crew curses the enemies of Humanity and is ready to destroy the heretics.
